articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Jaeryong Mine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Jaeryong Mine
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Jaeryong Mine.
					 After being briefed on the mine in front of the map showing a panoramic view of the Sungri Mining District and going round stopes, he acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the preparations for reenergizing the production there and the mineral output. 
					
					 Watching the miners engaged in the drive for increasing the production at stopes, he encouraged them who are bringing about miracles and innovations through the great endeavors to effect a new great revolutionary surge.
					
					 The workers of the mine have sent quality iron ore to iron works in time with ardent patriotism for a long period up to this date since the days of building a new country after the liberation, thus  greatly contributing to the nation's economic development, he said, calling upon them to give fuller play to the heroic stamina of the Korean working class in the final charge to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation by displaying the same spirit and stamina as they did in the past.
					
					 He noted that the Jaeryong Mine is an important mine directly linked with the iron production at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and other various iron works and advanced highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for developing the mine under a long-term plan. 
					
					 He said that it is a vast and difficult task to wind up the preparations for bringing about a leap forward in the iron ore production in a short span of time but the miners are sure to carry it out ahead of schedule in view of their exceptionally great enthusiasm as they are dashing like the wind, racing against time in response to the Party's call.
					
					 In order to keep the iron ore production going at a high rate it is necessary to thoroughly implement the Party's policy on massive ore cutting and massive ore transport, he noted, adding that to this end it is imperative to give priority to the earth removal, make all mining, carriage and screening equipment large-sized and, at the same time, carry out successful maintenance and overhaul of them to boost their operation rate. 
					
					 Underlining the need to make a good use of all iron ores without any waste as they are precious natural resources badly needed for the prosperity of the country, he said that to this end it is necessary to give priority to prospecting to fully secure reserve mining lots and, at the same time, take thoroughgoing measures for deep mining based on the latest science and technology.
					
					 Looking round the area of the mine, he stressed the need to level the area well, taking into consideration the peculiarity of the open mine and keep the compound and village of the mine cleaner hygienically and culturally and thus bring the advanced culture of the working class into full bloom.
					
					 He underscored the need to pay special attention to the work and life of the miners there as they work outside in all seasons despite rain or snow.
					
					 It is just three months since the torch of a new great revolutionary surge was kindled in Kangson but unprecedented great leap forward and innovations have been reported from all fronts including the metal industry and the machine industry and as a result the potential of the Juche-based industry of the DPRK has remarkably grown stronger as the days go by, he said, noting that this astonishing miracle confidently augurs the victory of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Recalling that the whole country is seething like lava of an active volcano thanks to the dynamic drive of the people in the DPRK to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation by the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, he stressed that this stirring era in which great epoch-making changes are about to take place requires all the party members and other working people who are soldiers and disciples of the President to devote themselves to the prosperity of the motherland.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the miners of the Jaeryong Mine would creditably fulfill their honorable mission and duty as vanguard and pioneers in the socialist economic construction and thus demonstrate the heroic spirit and invincible mettle in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Rak Hui, chief secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets EU Troika Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets EU Troika Delegation
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with the Troika delegation of the European Union led by Jiri Sitler, director of the Department of Asia and Pacific of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Credentials of Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Accepted
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
					 Kim conversed with the Palestinian ambassador after receiving his credentials.

articles.title: A delegation of the Buddhist Federation of Korea Leaves
articles.content:
A delegation of the Buddhist Federation of Korea Leaves
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Buddhist Federation of Korea led by Sim Sang Jin, chairman of its Central Committee, left here on Monday to attend the 2ndworld symposium on Buddhism to be held in China and Taipei of China.
					 A delegation of publicity and education officials of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam headed by Nguyen Van Hoa arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Many People Visit Junggang Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Many People Visit Junggang Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of working people from many units and school youth and children in Jagang Province is now flowing to the Junggang Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the 92nd anniversary of the formation of the Korean National Association (KNA).
					 The site is a historic place where Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, expanded and developed the KNA and waged the anti-Japanese struggle to retake the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists, staying from December Juche 7 (1918) to the autumn of the following year.
					
					 In the site there are the Junggang Inn, the Junggang Post Office, an angling site, a ferry, Private Sinsong School in Jungsang-ri, the Tonggu Church, the Tonggu Drugstore and other places which tell about his exploits.
					
					The site has been visited by over 70,000 people over the last one year.

articles.title: Noble Idea of Korean National Association
articles.content:
Noble Idea of Korean National Association
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- "The aim of the Korean National Association is to achieve national independence and establish a truly modern state by the efforts of the united Korean nation".
					These words of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, on the historic day 92 years ago epitomize the noble idea of the Korean National Association (KNA) on independence against imperialism and national unity.
					
					At that time, the Japanese imperialists resorted to brutal political suppression by a medieval military rule and robbed Korea of her resources at random by cooking up all kinds of evil laws such as the "Land Survey Act".
					
					The Korean people waged an anti-Japanese struggle of diverse forms against their harsh repression and gangster-like plunder, but their struggle ended in failure, torn asunder because of unsteady way of fight, dispersed and spontaneous nature and maneuvers of the worshippers of big powers and national reformists.
					
					Seeing through this situation, Kim Hyong Jik energetically pushed ahead with the formation of a new revolutionary organization for uniting the Korean nation, prompted by the idea of anti-imperialism and independence, the idea that the struggle for the independence of the country and the liberation of the nation could be won only by the efforts of the Korean people themselves, not in reliance upon foreign forces.
					
					He formed the KNA at Haktanggol, Pyongyang, on March 23, Juche 6 (1917) after thoroughgoing preparations.
					
					With the formation of the KNA, the Korean people came into possession of a powerful guiding revolutionary organization to give unified leadership to the national liberation movement on a nationwide scale by uniting all the anti-Japanese forces into one and the anti-Japanese national liberation movement embarked upon a new road to be advanced confidently by the organized strength of the Korean nation itself.
					
					The noble idea of the KNA was steadily carried forward by President Kim Il Sung and is being brought to a brilliant reality by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					The President, true to the high aim of Kim Hyong Jik, founded the immortal great Juche idea and opened up a road of independent development before the Korean revolution.  And he accomplished the historic cause of the country's liberation by leading the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and built the most superior socialist country centered on the popular masses in this land by leading the building of a new society to victory over a period of half a century.
					
					Regarding it his life-long mission to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President, Kim Jong Il has lifted the position of the DPRK to the highest plane with invincible Songun politics and brought the dawn of a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation, thus demonstrating the dignity and grand sight of Kim Il Sung's Korea to the whole world. 
					
					The DPRK will make a long drive through centuries and only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people, as the great idea and cause of the peerlessly great men are carried forward successfully through generations and Kim Jong Il leads the Korean revolution at its head.

articles.title: Hydro-Meteorological Activities against Natural Disasters and Air Pollution
articles.content:
Hydro-Meteorological Activities against Natural Disasters and Air Pollution
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is concentrating much effort on hydro-meteorological work to prevent natural disasters and air pollution.
					 The State Hydro-Meteorological Administration of the DPRK and meteorological, hydrological and oceanographic observatories across the country have established a well-arranged data communication system to inform weather data every day.
					
					 The administration provides necessary meteorological and hydrological data to various sectors of the national economy in time so as to prevent or reduce natural disasters as much as possible.
					
					 In order to curtail damages from dangerous disasters, a strict system for ensuring most accurate and swift forecast and warning abnormal weather phenomena has been established and this work is being carried on under social care.
					
					 The administration is also taking positive measures to prevent damages by the yellow sand and air pollution caused by climatic changes.
					
					 As soon as it gets information on the yellow sand occurring areas, the administration casts the news through TVs and radios.
					
					 It also is taking scrupulous measures to prevent air pollution by sulfurous acid gas emitted in neighboring countries by developing a template of sulfurous acid gas long-distance movement.
					
					 On the occasion of the World Meteorological Day (March 23), the DPRK is conducting various activities including lecture on the influence of yellow sand on the human body and on other contents to suit "Weather, climate and the air we breathe", the theme for this year put forth by the World Meteorological Organization.

articles.title: World Meteorological Day Observed
articles.content:
World Meteorological Day Observed
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates a signed article to World Meteorological Day. On this occasion every year the WMO sets a subject to draw international attention to the meteorological problems closely related to the human life, the important issues to be urgently solved in this domain in every period in particular, and conducts colorful events and activities according to it, the daily says.
					 Noting that long strides have been made in the worldwide meteorological observation and forecasting over the past years, the article stresses that it is the vital demand of the international community to prevent the global warming caused by human beings, a task which brooks no delay.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The abnormal weather phenomena bring about unexpected natural disasters, causing huge human and material losses. This requires further improving the worldwide meteorological observation and forecasting and boosting the international cooperation in that domain.
					
					 The DPRK, which entered the WMO in 1975, established the hydro-meteorological management system suited to its specific conditions and has stepped up the modernization of this system under the care of the state. It is striving to ensure correct and quick forecast for the meteorological conditions affecting the national economy and the people's living and activities, while strengthening the international cooperation in this field.

articles.title: Intensified Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement Called for
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Let all of us further intensify the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement and make a dynamic leap forward toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present stirring reality in which a new great revolutionary surge is being effected on all fronts of socialist construction calls for intensifying the above-said movement at a higher level.
					
					 The Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement is an all-people mass movement of the highest form for accelerating socialist construction by dynamically waging the ideological, technical and cultural revolutions as required by the process of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea. The above-said movement has been dynamically waged in all sectors and at all units over the past three decades under the leadership of the WPK to bring about astonishing miracles and changes in the Korean revolution and construction. The shining victory the DPRK has won in the Songun revolution by firmly defending socialism and ushering in a new magnificent era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation despite stern trials would have been unthinkable without the immortal exploits the WPK has performed by initiating and wisely steering such powerful mass movement as the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement long ago.
					
					 It is possible to fully demonstrate the might of socialism in all fields when the above-said movement is waged energetically. This is a precious lesson taught by the historic struggles waged in the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has built powerful political and military potentials for firmly protecting the dignity and security of the socialist country and successfully accomplishing the Juche revolutionary cause under the banner of Songun. Radical changes have taken place in the ideological and moral traits of the Korean people in the course of weathering out the tempests of the Songun revolution. A high-pitched drive for modernization is now under way in all sectors of the national economy and new culture in the era of Songun, the revolutionary soldier culture has been widely disseminated throughout the country under the leadership of the Party, ushering in a period of fresh renaissance in the cultural construction.
					
					 The WPK clearly indicated orientation and ways for developing in depth the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement at a new level on the basis of the strong aspiration and requirements of the servicepersons and people in the era of Songun, the achievements made in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and the tasks facing them.
					
					 They reflect the steadfast determination and will of the WPK to more dynamically wage the above-said movement whose validity and vitality have been fully proved in practice as a movement involving all people and the whole society and thus bring about a great leap forward and innovations in all fields of the revolution and construction and fly the flag of victory on the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail.
					
					 Noting that now is the time for all sectors and units to fully display the might of the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement, the editorial underscores the need to effectively wage the movement on a higher level as required by the developing reality.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Spirit of "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Spirit of "By Our Nation Itself"
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- "By our nation itself" is the basic idea which the Koreans should enshrine in their struggle for national reunification and it is the steadfast spirit of national independence and the spirit of national unity, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification turned the north-south relations characterized by mistrust and confrontation that lasted for more than half a century into those of reconciliation and unity. It goes to prove that "By our nation itself" is noble patriotic spirit as it helps bring earlier independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 National reunification should be achieved independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the north and the south free from foreign interference. This is the core of the spirit of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 All Koreans should have transparent awareness of national independence that they should independently solve the issue of national reunification related to the destiny of the nation by their concerted efforts. This is the key to rejecting foreign aggression and interference and flunkeyism and dependence on foreign forces and reenergizing the movement for national reunification. Despite the vicious obstructions of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group the driving force for national reunification has grown strong, the movement for national reunification dynamic and national reconciliation and unity and independent reunification have become an irresistible trend of the times. This is ascribable to the spirit of "By our nation itself" firmly enshrined in the minds of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The above-said spirit represents the will and faith of all Koreans to make everything meet the interests of the nation, loving and valuing it more than anything else, and wage the movement for national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans. Giving full play to the spirit of "By our nation itself" alone guarantees the dignity and honor of the nation, national pride and self-esteem and the indomitable will and stamina of the Koreans. 
					
					 Only when all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad turn out in the movement for national independence and reunification as one, is it possible to throw overboard the anti-reunification elements and traitors in south Korea, definitely turn the north-south relations into the ties between compatriots and open a new history of peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Dismissed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Dismissed
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, addressing a recent graduation ceremony of a puppet naval academy, again talked nonsense about the inter-Korean relations that "the south and the north should opt for co-existence and co-prosperity, not confrontation." The minister of "Unification" and his other mandarins tried to create the impression that they are willing to improve the inter-Korean relations, while talking about "unconditional dialogue." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The group of traitors' loudmouthed "dialogue" is nothing but a wordplay to calm down the domestic and foreign public's bitter criticism of the maneuvers for a war of aggression against the DPRK staged by it, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to such dangerous phase that a war may break out any moment and its act of driving the north-south relations to the worst crisis in which there is neither dialogue nor cooperation.
					
					 The door will never be opened to inter-Korean dialogue as long as the Lee group persists in their moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, and even if it takes place, it will turn into a platform for fresh confrontation.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want dialogue and cooperation and have a will to improve the inter-Korean relations, they should, first of all, discard their posture and stand to do harm to compatriots in league with foreign forces and immediately roll back their treacherous "policy towards the north."
					
					 The Lee group had better stop letting loose rhetoric intended to mislead the public opinion, mindful that the more frequently it gives lip-service to "dialogue" without making any policy switchover, the more saliently it will reveal the group's true colors as wicked separatists.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Authorities under Fire
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Authorities under Fire
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A city committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia released a statement on Mar. 19 to denounce the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers for their anti-DPRK moves.
					 The statement charged that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities waged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression in spite of the DPRK's repeated warnings and the world progressive people's protest.
					
					 It branded the exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces as an undisguised military threat to the independent DPRK and a criminal act detrimental to the Korean people's desire for peace and reunification.
					
					 The facts go to prove again that the new U.S. administration's promise to find a negotiated solution to the issue of the Korean Peninsula is no more than rhetoric and the U.S. remains unchanged in its ambition for aggression on the DPRK, it said.
					
					 The said exercises, the statement said, are also an attempt to unleash a new war on the peninsula and lay obstacles in the way of the Korean nation's unity.
					
					 It strongly demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities renounce the adventurous and aggressive joint military exercises they are frequently waging against the DPRK on the Korean Peninsula and the U.S. withdraw all its aggression armed forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Syrian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Syrian Political Figure
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Fayez Ismail, general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, highly praised the feats of President Kim Il Sung when he met with Choe Su Hon, DPRK ambassador to Syria who paid a courtesy call on him on March 15.
					 Warmly congratulating the Korean people on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, he said that he has always remembered that he had an audience of Kim Il Sung during his visit to the DPRK in 1968.
					
					 He praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader not only of the Korean people but also of the Syrian people and other progressives the world over.
					
					 Thanks to the immortal Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, the Korean people have made great successes and progress and the world progressives could wage a more dynamic struggle against imperialism, he stressed.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Russia
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting was held outside the south Korean puppet embassy in Moscow on March 16 in support of the DPRK's planned space development for peaceful purposes and denunciation of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK moves.
					 Present there were figures of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and citizens of Moscow.
					
					 Addressing the meeting, V. Zhirinovsky, vice-chairman of the State Duma of Russia and chairman of the said party, referred to the recent situation of the Korean Peninsula growing extremely tense.
					
					 It is not the DPRK but the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces that are rendering the situation of the peninsula strained, he said, adding that the DPRK's satellite launch will be an exercise of legitimate right by a sovereign state.
					
					 He held that all sorts of military exercises should be stopped in south Korea to prevent a war on the peninsula.
					
					 The behavior of the new U.S. administration fully proves the real intention of the U.S. ruling quarters keen on lies and hypocrisy, he pointed out.
					
					 The participants in the meeting strongly condemned the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets for having aggravated the situation of the peninsula through their adventurous large-scale war maneuvers, chanting such slogans as "No war!" and "We oppose the military saber rattling in south Korea!".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige creacion de la Opera "Hong Lu Meng"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige creacion de la Opera "Hong Lu Meng"
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la creacion de la Opera "Hong Lu Meng".
					En el mismo lugar el Dirigente fue acogido por los funcionarios directivos del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre y otros funcionarios.
					
					Luego de hacer conocimiento del proceso de la creacion de la opera, presencio la obra en creacion.
					
					 En pleno acato a las instrucciones del Dirigente de recrear y representar ampliamente este ano, "Ano de la amistad Corea-China", la Opera "Hong Lu Meng" creada y representada en la decada de 1960, el citando Conjunto Operistico esta recreandola conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Tras verla, el Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los creadores y artistas presentaron la magnifica opera que refleja fielmente la demanda de la obra original dedicando toda la inteligencia y pasion, evaluo altamente sus exitos creativos y les dio su agradecimiento sincero.
					
					Subrayo que la opera creada en un corto plazo asegura en alto nivel artistico todos los elementos  desde las canciones hasta la formacion de instrumentos musicos, la escenografia y el vestuario y destaco que los exitos alcanzados por el Conjunto Operistico prueban que cuando la vision innovadora del siglo XXI se combine con el modo de creacion y estilo de lucha de la decada de 1970, es posible registrar un extraordinario auge creativo.
					
					Senalo que deben completarla en un nivel supremo y mostrarla a nuestro pueblo en el presente, "Ano de la amistad Corea-China" y dilucido las concretas tareas y medios para el particular.
					
					Dijo que es invariable la voluntad de nuestro Partido y pueblo de consolidar y desarrollar la preciosa amistad Corea-China preparada a traves del largo tiempo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y los dirigentes de generacion vieja de China y continuo que el intercambio cultural ocupa suma importancia en el fomento de la amistad entre los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del Comite Central del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, Choe Ik Gyu y Kim Yang Gon y el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kang Sok Ju.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador palestino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador palestino
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan presento este lunes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Estado de Palestina en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el nuevo embajador palestino.

articles.title: Toma intensidad en Corea la hidrometeorologia
articles.content:
Toma intensidad en Corea la hidrometeorologia
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- En Corea se presta mucha atencion a la hidrometeorologia para prevenir los desastres naturales y la contaminacion atmosferica.
					  La Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica y los observatorios meteorologicos, hidrologicos y oceanograficos en distintas localidades del pais brindan todos los dias las informaciones de la rama a base de un ordenado sistema de intercambio de datos.
					
					  En particular, la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica distribuye a tiempo los datos meteorologicos e hidrologicos, que se necesitan en varias ramas de la economia nacional, para prevenir y reducir en todo lo posible los danos naturales.
					
					  Hizo mas perfecto el sistema de pronosticar y alarmar con rapidez y alta precision los anormales fenomenos climaticos e impulsa esta labor como campana de toda la sociedad.
					
					  Ademas, toma eficientes medidas para prevenir la contaminacion atmosferica como el fenomeno de polvos amarillos arenosos causado por el cambio climatico.
					
					  Por ejemplo, a traves de TV y la radio, transmite las informaciones, tan pronto como las reciba, sobre las zonas donde fueron levantados los polvos amarillos y desarrollo la maqueta de desplazamiento a larga distancia del gas sulfuroso para prevenir la contaminacion por este gas proveniente de los paises vecinos.
					
					  Por otra parte, se desarrollan en Corea diversas actividades, entre otras, las conferencias de varios asuntos como las influencias de polvos amarillos arenosos sobre el cuerpo humano, de acuerdo con el tema presentado por la Organizacion Meteorologica Mundial para el Dia Mundial de la Meteorologia (23 de marzo) de este ano, "Tiempo, el clima y el aire que respiramos".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales"
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual del dia 23, el periodico Rodong Sinmun enfatizo que el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", fundamentado en la independencia y la unidad nacionales, es el ideal principal a ser acatado por la nacion coreana en su lucha por la reunificacion de la patria.
					  La epoca de reunificacion iniciada el l5 de junio, que trajo el giro de las relaciones de desconfianza y enfrentamiento, que perduraban mas de medio siglo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, a la reconciliacion y la unidad, confirma que el citado ideal deviene el noble espiritu patriotico para lograr lo mas pronto posible la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad, senala el articulista y continua:
					
					  La reunificacion de la patria debe ser realizada de manera independiente basandose en las fuerzas unidas de los coreanos del Norte y el Sur sin ninguna injerencia de las fuerzas foraneas, he aqui el nucleo del espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" aclarado en la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					
					  Todos los coreanos deben poseer la firme conciencia de independencia nacional consistente en solucionar de manera independiente con las fuerzas unidas de si mismos el problema de reunificacion de la patria relacionado con el destino nacional.
					
					  Esto es la clave para dinamizar el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria oponiendose a la agresion, la intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas, el servilismo a grandes potencias y a la dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  Hoy dia, pese a las brutales maniobras obstructoras de EE.UU. y la banda de Lee Myung Bak, se fortalecen las fuerzas subjetivas de la reunificacion de la patria, se dinamiza el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria y se convierten en la indetenible corriente de la epoca la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y la reunificacion independiente, lo cual es el resultado del arraigo del ideal en cuestion en el corazon de la nacion coreana.
					
					  En el estan reflejadas la voluntad y la conviccion de toda la nacion coreana de amar y apreciar infinitamente a su nacion, sujetar lo todo a los intereses nacionales y desarrollar con las fuerzas nacionales unidas el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  En desplegar altamente el espiritu en cuestion estan la dignidad, el honor y el orgullo de la nacion y su indoblegable temperamento.
					
					  Cuando todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar se levanten unanimemente en el movimiento de reunificacion por la independencia nacional, seran eliminados los traidores anti-reunificacion en el Sur de Corea, las relaciones intercoreanas se convertiran firmemente en las entre los compatriotas y se iniciara la nueva historia de paz y prosperidad.
